metadata.name: CMSTP Execution Process Creation
metadata.comment: Detects various indicators of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cmstp.exe')))

output.summary: Detects various indicators of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer execution

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line, Details False positive: Legitimate CMSTP use (unlikely in modern enterprise environments) Reference: https://web.archive.org/web/20190720093911/http://www.endurant.io/cmstp/detecting-cmstp-enabled-code-execution-and-uac-bypass-with-sysmon/
